name: Applications
text: Applications for general assistance to households without minor dependents shall be made by the applicant or by someone acting in the applicant's behalf in the manner, place, and form prescribed by the department of human services. [L 1941, c 296, pt of §1; RL 1945, §4864; RL 1955, §108-42; HRS ; am L 1970, c 105, §5; gen ch 1985; am L 1987, c 339, §4; am L 1997, c 200, §§8, 11; am L 1998, c 127, §5]
